description: This file defines the `CodeFormater` class, a helper utility used to generate and format tabular code snippets or textual data, typically supporting code generation and documentation tasks.

classes.name: CodeFormater
classes.description: A utility class to manage and output data in a tabular, aligned format, supporting dynamic row and column management, including filler rows and buffered output.

classes.name: CodeFormater.Row
classes.description: A private nested class representing a single row within the table, managing cell data and filler state.

methods.name: CodeFormater
methods.description: Constructor initializing the formatter with a specified number of columns.

methods.name: setValue
methods.description: Sets the value of a specific cell in the current row.

methods.name: nextRow
methods.description: Advances to a new row for subsequent data entry.

methods.name: appendFillerRow
methods.description: Adds a filler row with a specified line, used for visual separation or spacing.

methods.name: printBuffer
methods.description: Outputs the formatted table to a PrintWriter stream with specified left padding.

methods.name: toStringBuffer
methods.description: Returns a string buffer representation of the formatted table with specified padding.
